product_overview: Explicare is a web-based legal management system designed for law firms to securely manage legal processes and share PDF and video documents with clients.
core_goals: Provide secure authentication and team member management.
Enable comprehensive administrative oversight of legal processes and team metrics.
Facilitate easy uploading and sharing of legal documents with clients, including QR code positioning on PDFs.
Offer clients a secure, password-protected portal for accessing process information and related media.
Allow customization of the system settings including whitelabel branding and UI themes.
key_features: User authentication with email/password login and team member registration using Supabase Auth.
Admin dashboard with metrics visualization, process list with search and pagination, team management, and analytical reports.
Upload form for new legal processes supporting PDF and video uploads, QR code visual positioning on PDFs, and unique client link generation.
Client landing page with password protection, video playback, PDF download, and WhatsApp contact button.
Settings page featuring whitelabel customization and dark/light mode toggle with persistence via localStorage.
user_flow_summary: User logs in or registers as a new team member via the LoginPage or RegisterPage.
Admin navigates the AdminDashboard to monitor processes, metrics, and manage the team.
Admin uploads new legal processes via UploadForm, including PDFs, videos, and positioning QR codes using PdfVisualEditor.
Clients access their process details on a password-protected LandingPage where they can view videos and download PDFs.
Users personalize settings such as theme mode and branding on the ConfiguracoesPage.
validation_criteria: Authentication must succeed only with valid credentials.
Dashboard displays all registered processes accurately with search and pagination.
Uploading a new process generates a functioning unique link to the client landing page.
Landing page shows video and PDF content only after correct password entry.
Settings changes persist across sessions and reflect immediately in the UI.
